comment.body:
Your forum has problem. When i try to post new topic, it says:
"File write error: Forbidden, you can only modify your own files"
Please check [this comment of mine](/1TaLkFrMwvbNsooF4ioKAY9EuxTBTjipT/?Topic:1546021672_19s3iztHV7i3fBN9wyiMhiXECoZvyNjLhr#comment_571_1L4dZcDF2maSKHDy788yhxpYnBWnXadUtS) if you can fix it..
